original_body_lines: Our sister papers Daily Lankadeepa and the Sunday Lankadeepa won the most popular newspaper award for the 17th consecutive year at ‘SLIM- KANTAR Peoples Award 2023’ being held at Monarch Imperial, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte this evening.
The awards ceremony was organised by the Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM) together with Kantar, Sri Lanka.
